mapper.select: select l.chatidx, r.chatcontent, r.chatdate, c.cridx, c.crnick, c.placename, m.memidx, m.memnick, r.chatread, r.contenttype from chatlist l join carry c on l.cridx=c.cridx join member m on l.memidx=m.memidx left outer join chatroom r on r.messageidx = (SELECT MAX(r.messageidx) from chatroom r where r.chatidx = l.chatidx and m.memidx=#{memidx}) group by r.chatidx;

select l.chatidx, r.chatcontent, r.chatdate, c.cridx, c.crnick, c.placename, m.memidx, m.memnick, r.chatread, r.contenttype from chatlist l join carry c on l.cridx=c.cridx join member m on l.memidx=m.memidx left outer join chatroom r on r.messageidx = (SELECT MAX(r.messageidx) from chatroom r where r.chatidx = l.chatidx and c.cridx=#{cridx}) group by r.chatidx;
select cridx, crnick, placename from carry
select chatidx from chatlist where cridx=#{cridx} and memidx=#{memidx}
select count(*) from chatlist where chatidx=#{param}
mapper.insert: insert into chatroom (chatidx, chatcontent, cridx, memidx, contenttype, chatread) values (#{chatidx},#{chatcontent},#{cridx},#{memidx},#{contenttype}, #{chatread})
mapper.update: update chatroom set chatread=1 where chatidx=#{chatidx} and contenttype=#{contenttype}
